resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81433</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81433</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4721</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Approaches to Writing</string>
            <string language="es">Metodologías para escribir</string>
            <string language="ga">Cur chuige i leith na Scríbhneoireachta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nähert sich zum Schreiben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">S'approche à l'écriture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aproxima-se à escrita</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Si avvicina a a scrittura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προσεγγίσεις στο γράψιμο</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A document that compares and contrasts the traditional method of teaching writing with the writing process approach advocated in the revised curriculum in English.</string>
            <string language="es">Un documento que compara y contrasta el método tradicional de la enseñanza de la escritura con la metodología del proceso de escritura recomendado en el currículum revisado en inglés.</string>
            <string language="ga">Cáipéis a chuireann modh múinte traidisiúnta na scríbhneoireachta i gcomparáid agus i gcodarsnacht leis an gcur chuige próiseis a mholtar i gcuraclam athbhreithnithe an Bhéarla.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="es">Inglés. Hoja de consejos</string>
            <string language="ga">Béarla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Advice Sheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Chomhairle</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Dokument, das die traditionelle Methode des 
Unterrichtens des Schreibens mit der Schreiben Prozeßannäherung 
vergleicht und kontrastiert, die im korrigierten Lehrplan auf englisch
befürwortet wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un document qui compare et contraste la méthode 
traditionnelle d'enseigner l'écriture avec l'approche de processus 
d'écriture préconisée dans le programme d'études révisé en 
anglais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um original que compare e contraste o método 
tradicional de ensinar a escrita com a aproximação do processo da 
escrita advogada no curriculum revisado em inglês.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un documento che confronta e contrappone il metodo
tradizionale di istruzione della scrittura con il metodo di processo 
di scrittura sostenuto nel programma di studi modificato in inglese.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα έγγραφο που συγκρίνει και αντιπαραβάλλει την 
παραδοσιακή μέθοδο διδασκαλίας γράφοντας με την προσέγγιση 
διαδικασίας γραψίματος που υποστηρίζεται στο αναθεωρημένο 
πρόγραμμα σπουδών στα αγγλικά.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rateblatt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Feuille de conseil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha Do Conselho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio Di Consiglio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο συμβουλών</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
